is the capital of the province of

Flying to Dipolog is a good way to get to Mindanao. Cebu Pacific flies from Manila daily. while Philippine Airlines also has daily flights from Manila to Dipolog. The city is also reachable from Mactan Cebu International Airport with Cebu Pacific. Cebu Pacific also fly to and from Davao city.
To visit other cities take the coach to Ozamis and beyond. Rural Transit Bus (RTMI) is the main company the airconditioned buses can be servere so best go non-aircon (De Luxe buses).
The best way to get around are tricycle, habal-habal (Single motorcycle), & multicabs.

The center of Dipolog at night during Christmas. It is a truely wonderful sight, the decorations and the small stall and the sounds of people. It is truely captivating. As a Brit, I thought our towns were well decorated at Christmas, but boy you have not seen anything until you have gone to Dipolog.

We stayed with Pastor Simbran in Filkids, Uppper Turno. For three weeks we experienced the wonders of this Orchid City. The people a so friendly and helpful, it was a real joy to visit.

Duncan Murray, Gloucestershire England. www.fodcc.org.

value: name=The Cathedral of Our Lady of the Most Holy Rosary
content=Visit the 105 year old church in the city proper.

By morning: You can go to the bay walk to exercise for some energy around 4:00-6:00 a.m. Then,go shopping by which the locals call

.

By afternoon: You can get around by walking to Plaza Magsaysay, Bay walk, go swimming in the beach or just go shopping at Lee Plaza, Dipolog Mall, Vallecer or Friendly Mart. Or you can eat snacks from restaurants.

By evening: Dipolog is sparkling when the night comes. You can go to bay walk which has so many events like concerts. Or go some disco clubs like FatCat or Zpol.

value: content=Hilander Farm is a new tourist destination in Dipolog City. It takes 2-3 hours by multicab to reach the place, its kinda rough road when you reach Center place in Mutia, going to the said place. The place have nice native and antique style of the house, swimming pool for kids and for adults with nice and cool overflowing water. They also have Zipline for extreme adventurers.
